pkgmetadata.longdescription: Animated Biplots // Create animated biplots that enables dynamic visualisation of temporal or sequential changes in multivariate data by animating a single biplot across the levels of a time variable. It builds on objects from the 'biplotEZ' package, Lubbe S, le Roux N, Nienkemper-Swanepoel J, Ganey R, Buys R, Adams Z, Manefeldt P (2024) doi:10.32614/CRAN.package.biplotEZ, allowing users to create animated biplots that reveal how both samples and variables evolve over time.
